GDP increase under high temperature shock with a positive monetary policy shock. Study period ends in 2021.
GDP increase under low temperature shock with a positive monetary policy shock. Study period ends in 2021.

Qualitative description from Figure 6 indicates GDP response to monetary policy shocks is different under high temperature regimes compared to low temperature regimes, but the figures do not allow for precise quantification. Impacts depend on whether the monetary policy shock is positive or negative.

Impacts depend on whether the monetary policy shock is positive or negative. Considering tempv_30, tempv_25 and tempv_20 scenarios. Assumes shocks originate in M2.
